channel.title: Problem and Solution Session
channel.description: Recent content on Problem and Solution Session

item.title: Github Activity Problem
item.description: The GitHub Activity Problem refers to the challenges developers face when trying to keep track of their activity on GitHub. This can include monitoring contributions, managing repositories, and maintaining an active presence on the platform. The issue is compounded for developers working on multiple projects or collaborating with different teams. You’re experiencing an issue where after creating a new repository, the initial activity shows up on your profile and others can see it.
